component.notes: IP control has limited functionality. IP does not have commands for: - Volume - ColorMode - Aspect

action_argument.name: ColorMode
action_argument.note: 01: sRGB 04: Presentation 05: Theatre 06: Dynamic 08: Sports 11: Black Board 12: White Board 14: Photo

action_argument.name: RearMode
action_argument.note: ON: Rear ON OFF: Rear OFF

action_argument.name: CeilingMode
action_argument.note: ON: Ceiling ON OFF: Ceiling OFF
